import React from "react"; import tw from "tailwind-styled-components"; import LogoLineShadow from "../../assets/images/logo-v4-line-shadow.svg"; const Container = tw.div`hidden navbar-menu relative z-50`; const NavbarClose = tw.button``; function SideMenu() { return ( <>
    {/* 이 li가 6개 반복해야 됨 -> map 함수 사용 권장 */}
    • Chp.1 Install Go & Rust
    • Chp.2 Wasm / Wasmd
    • Chp.3 Testnet(Cliffnet)
    • Chp.4 Interaction with Contract
); } export default SideMenu;
